A1: Two Chinese workers kidnapped and threatened at a China-backed copper mine in Myanmar
RelatedSentence: YANGON : Two Chinese workers kidnapped and threatened at a China - backed copper mine in Myanmar have been released , their firm said on Monday , after they were held by activists demanding a halt to the controversial project .

YANGON : Two Chinese workers kidnapped and threatened at a China - backed copper mine in Myanmar have been released , their firm said on Monday , after they were held by activists demanding a halt to the controversial project .
China 's Wanbao , which operates the Letpadaung mine in the northwestern town of Monywa , said the two abducted 23 - year - old contractors had been freed , one day after being abducted .
